Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains a number of small white inclusions, the interior is slightly grooved, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of the remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393490) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393490)
